Mayor & City Council
====================

Physical Address:

200 S. Rusk St.  
Gainesville, TX 76240

Phone:

(940) 668-4500 ext. 1101

Fax:

(940) 668-4518

Link: [City Council Page](http://www.gainesville.tx.us/132/City-Council)  
  

Hours  
Monday - Friday  
8:00 am - 5:00 pm
